title: [bug] panic: assertion failed: removed_resource.is_none() in src/resources/mod.rs:116:5

labels.name: status: needs triage
labels.description: This issue needs to triage, applied to new issues

body:
### Describe the bug

I received the information from a person who has run the application many times in short intervals since closing it.
It threw him an error from tauri crate.

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/bbc6245f-e31b-47ad-97a3-082cae4fb2ca)
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/3c7c5cd0-8cca-465d-a56c-f7cfe77003db)


### Reproduction

1. Launch apllication
2. Close Application
3. Launch apllication
4. Close Application
etc.

### Expected behavior

The application should work without a problem.
